title: Interpretation of seeing God Almighty in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing God Almighty in a dream: If the dreamer sees God Almighty looking at him in his dream, it indicates the dreamer’s return to God Almighty and repentance to Him. If the sleeper sees that God Almighty is speaking to him in a dream, then this dream indicates the purity and purity of the dreamer’s heart, and God knows best. Seeing one person To God Almighty in her dream indicates that she will achieve all her ambitions and goals that she was striving for. Seeing the Word of God in a dreamIf an unmarried girl sees the Word of God in her dream, this indicates that she will soon marry a good man, God willing. Seeing a married womanThe words of God in this dream The vision is praiseworthy and indicates marital happiness and family stability. Seeing the word of God in the dreamer’s dream means that the dreamer will achieve all of his goals that he was trying to achieve, and God knows best. The dreamer who mentions the word of God in a dream shows victory over the enemies surrounding him and getting rid of the bad deeds in his life. Interpretation of a dream Pleasing God in a dream Pleasing God in a dream refers to the good qualities that the dreamer is distinguished by, and he performs charitable deeds, and God knows best. Seeing the sleeper with whom God Almighty is pleased indicates the strength of the relationship between the dreamer and his Lord and his closeness to him by doing good deeds. If the dreamer sees that his Lord is pleased with him in his dream, then This dream indicates the arrival of goodness, abundance, and happiness for the dreamer. See the dreamer. God is pleased with him in the dream. The dreamer’s righteousness and piety in this world appears and that he is on the right path. Interpretation of seeing a monologue with God. Seeing a monologue with God in a dream symbolizes that he is committing many sins and must approach God and repent. To him. If the dreamer sees that he is talking with God in his dream, then this dream indicates his good behavior by which he is known to people and his love for his Lord. Seeing him sleeping that talking with God Almighty in a dream symbolizes the arrival of kindness, sustenance, and a lot of money to the dreamer. God Almighty has promised the dreamer With forgiveness in a dream, indicating the death of worry, grief, sadness, anguish, and distress, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of seeing light in a dream If the dreamer sees God’s light in his sleep, this dream indicates a large number of descendants, and it also indicates the abundant knowledge that the person who has the vision enjoys. Ibn Sirin says Seeing the light of God in a dream indicates repentance and a return to God Almighty, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. A single girl seeing the light of God in a dream is a good and promising vision. This means that she will soon marry a good young man who will make her happy in her next life. But if a married woman sees the light of God in a dream, This indicates that she will soon give birth to a child with beautiful features, by the command of God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing God’s promise in a dream: Seeing him sleeping, God promised him, and entering Paradise indicates the arrival of goodness, abundance of livelihood, abundance of money, and happiness of the dreamer. And whoever sees that God Almighty promised him in his dream to enter Paradise, this dream indicates To repent to God and seek forgiveness from Him. As for the dreamer who sees that God promised him something in a dream, this vision indicates that the dreamer will achieve his goals and aspirations. See the point: God’s promise in the dream, happiness, security, and prosperity.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead girl coming back to life for a married woman

preview.html: This is the result of constantly thinking about that dead person, but if the thought is normal and nothing more than logic, then the vision can be interpreted through this article provided by gptafser.com/.Interpretation of seeing a dead girl coming back to life in a dream for a single girlIf an unmarried girl sees that a dead girl She came back to life, and I hugged her in a dream. The vision showed a lot of happiness that is gained from hardships and fatigue. If an unmarried girl sees that she is hitting a girl who has come back to life in a dream. The vision indicates that the person who had the vision is carrying out some acts of hatred. She will review all her affairs, by God. I know. Whereas if an unmarried girl sees that the water girl has come back to life and was not known to her in a dream. This may mean that there are some difficulties that she will face in her life, and God knows best. If he sees a dead child, he will come back to life and kiss her in a dream. The vision may indicate That there are some things on the way to make her happy. It is like seeing a child who was almost dying being rescued, and a single girl saving him in a dream. This is one of the dreams that I spread about the coming of goodness, thanks to God Almighty. See also: I dreamed that I hugged a little girl. The interpretation of seeing a dead child coming back to life in a dream for a married woman indicates Interpretation of seeing a dead child coming back to life in a married woman’s dream indicates some changes occurring in her life. This means that if a married woman sees herself hugging a dead child, she has come back to life in a dream. The vision indicates getting rid of the problems and difficulties that occur in her life and improving in All conditions are thanks to God Almighty. While if he sees that he is kissing the child who has come back to life in a married woman’s dream, it is a sign that there is someone who will help her wonderfully in all matters related to her personal life. If a married woman dreams of taking a dead child and returning him to the grave. The vision indicates There are those who plan and design some things that may harm the vision, and God is the Most High. The meaning of a married woman seeing a dead child coming back to life again in a dream. It confirms that there are positive changes that will be in her favor, God willing. The interpretation of seeing a dead girl coming back to life in a dream for a man and its meaning was: A man A married man watches a girl who died and he knew that she came back to life in a dream. It is a sign of getting rid of all the problems that surround him. Whereas, if a married man sees that the dead child he knows has come back to life, he embraces her in a dream. It is a clear indication that this person He does many good deeds. For many people around him, especially for those who know him. In other interpretations, we see a dead child being revived in a married man’s dream. Indicates good behavior in matters that require careful decision-making. Dreaming of a young girl crying in a married man’s dream It indicates. He will get rid of all the problems surrounding him, especially marital ones. Seeing a child running in a married man’s dream after waking up from sleep or returning to life. It is an indication of the positive changes that have occurred that will change the general shape of his life for the better, God willing. Read Also: Interpretation of a dream about someone standing up

title: Learn about the interpretation of urine in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Urinating in a dream is one of the dreams that cause a state of anxiety and fear among dreamers for fear of the negative connotations they carry, but contrary to what some people expect, urine symbolizes the arrival of great goodness in the dreamer’s life, and today we will mention the most important of the interpretations of this vision. Urinating in a dream is considered a promising vision, unlike... What some people expect, as it symbolizes a large number of positive interpretations, and we have collected for you the most important interpretations mentioned by the great dream interpreters: Urine in a dream is evidence that God’s relief is approaching, and that blessing will descend upon his life and rid him of any evil that was bothering him. Whoever sees in a dream that He urinates milk, so the vision here is not bad, as it indicates abundant goodness that will come to the dreamer’s life, as well as great financial gains. Seeing urine in scattered places in the house is a sign that the dreamer is constantly under stress and can never get out of this situation. The smell of urine Foul odor in a dream reflects the amount of responsibilities and burdens that the dreamer bears in his life, and he must be patient and pray so that he can get out of this situation. Seeing urine in underwear is a sign that the dreamer will face a difficult problem in his life and unfortunately he will not be able to deal with it. Changing the color of urine in a dream It indicates that the dreamer will fall into a financial crisis that will lead to many debts, and God knows best.Ura in a dream by Ibn SirinThe scholar Ibn Sirin confirmed that urine in a dream is evidence of the good that will come in the life of the dreamer. Below are the most prominent interpretations of the vision: If the dreamer is facing a difficult problem, the vision foretells him that he will emerge from this crisis soon and with the least losses. If urine is seen in various places, the vision reflects the burdens that weigh on the dreamer and he cannot escape from them. Urinating in a dream by Ibn Sirin It is a sign of the good things that will come in the dreamer’s life, and he will also escape from all his life’s worries and crises and regain his psychological stability. Whoever sees in his dream that he is urinating standing up, this is a sign that the dreamer is wasting his money, so he must be careful not to find himself drowning in debt as the passage of time passes. Days. Whoever sees in his dream that he is urinating in the right place is evidence that the dreamer will obtain a lot of sustenance in his life, knowing that he has the ability to manage his life’s affairs without asking for help from others. Urine in a dream for a single woman. Urine in a dream for a single woman is considered one of Desired visions that carry a variety of positive interpretations. Urine in a dream is considered good news for the dream lady’s upcoming wedding date, as her marriage will be to a young man who has a number of good qualities, such as honesty and dealing with affection and compassion, so she will find with him the happiness that she lacks in her life. Seeing urine in an unmarried woman’s dream is a sign that many desirable things will happen in the dreamer’s life and she will achieve things that she has always been trying to achieve. Seeing urinating in an unmarried woman’s dream means that her life is largely stable and in the event of quarrels or disagreements, they will disappear in

title: Interpretation of seeing a monkey in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a monkey in a dream. Ibn Sirin mentioned in the chapter on the monkey that he is a fraudster. Raising a monkey for some people means the beginning of disputes and conflicts between the same family. If one sees him in a dream, this means severe anxiety that afflicts him. Interpretation of a dream about many monkeys: This means that you are a person surrounded by fake deceivers. Around you. If more than one monkey is found somewhere, this means that disasters and misfortunes will happen. A monkey bite means harm from someone close to you. Interpretation of a dream about a monkey for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing a monkey is not good for an unmarried virgin, if she has an innocent relationship with a young man or She was engaged to a man, which means that this person has obnoxious morals, and the monkey means that her relationship will end in failure. Failure may indicate a partner in work or study, as this person is cunning and tries to deceive or harm her. Interpretation of a monkey in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a monkey in a dream for a married woman means That there are people who seek to harm her and destroy her married life. A monkey means extreme poverty after wealth. A dream about a monkey is a warning to a woman, because there are events that change her married life for the worse. Interpretation of a dream about a monkey attack: Animal hostility in a dream is not good. If one dreams that a monkey is attacking him, his interpretation means diseases that affect your body. If you resist the monkey and are able to defend yourself, you will survive and recover from the disease. Or overcome fears, while if you are haunted by a monkey, the disease affects you for a while, or you fall into the circle of anxiety in your home for a certain period. Interpretation of a monkey in a dream for a manInterpretation of a dream about a brown monkey could mean that you are a money thief, or perhaps you are embezzling or actually stealing A monkey means opening the door to debt and financial loss. If you dream that you are eating monkey meat, this means that you will hear unpleasant news or feel very sad. Killing a monkey in a dream means healing and putting an end to exhaustion and arguments with your wife or family. Expelling the monkey from the house It means ample livelihood and resolving disputes. Interpretation of a dream about a monkey for a pregnant woman. One of the best dreams for a pregnant woman is a dream about a monkey, meaning that she is pregnant with a son, and God knows best. Her new baby has high moral qualities and good manners and follows the path of God Almighty. A monkey means sustenance and wealth after poverty. Interpretation of seeing a monkey It indicates an easy birth. I dreamed that I caught a monkey. The little monkey in the dream indicates a cunning enemy of the dreamer. A man who sees a monkey in his dream indicates that he will commit sins or commit some trouble. I saw that a monkey was caught. A small child in a dream is a sign of suffering and sadness that enters him and pollutes him. Seeing a female monkey in a dream It means that the man meets a charming woman who works in magic and sorcery. The monkey that stands on the dreamer's shoulder indicates that he is being robbed. The dreamer turning into a monkey in a dream indicates that he works with magic. A monkey in a woman's dream. A married woman shows her knowledge of a man who is trying to destroy her life with her husband and divorce her from him. Seeing a married monkey entering her house indicates To the problems that will happen to her and that will make her suffer and be sad. Female gorilla in the

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about pigeons by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretations of a dream about bathing: Seeing a dove is one of the promising visions of goodness, blessing and happiness, and jurists agreed that the dove is a symbol of peace, tranquility and reconciliation and a guide for a righteous woman and a man who takes care of his family in detail and explanation, as we list the cases that differ from one person to another.Interpretation of a dream about bathing: Seeing a dove symbolizes peace, love, freedom and fulfillment. Goals and objectives. The dove is a woman of good character who keeps secrets and covenants. Birds with the dove indicate good news and good news. As for the falling of the dove, it indicates the approaching term and the destruction and instability of circumstances. Whoever sees that he is holding another dove commits adultery with the man’s wife, it is not permissible. The dove symbolizes Answered prayers and good deeds, and the dove represents marriage to an unmarried man, and whoever sees a dove jumping on him, this is news that he is waiting for and calms his heart. Interpretation of a dream about a dove by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a dove expresses calm, familiarity, friendliness, ease, and pleasure, and that the dove symbolizes a woman who is good in her personality. Who does not satisfy a man except her husband. The dove interprets news and correspondence between people’s passion and their passion. Love. Seeing the gift of a dove expresses the lover’s criticism of his beloved. The dove expresses love, a loyal friend, a charming beloved woman, keeping secrets, and fulfilling vows and covenants. The dove is an honest messenger who keeps the secret and conveys it without emptying its contents. As for the interpretation of the dove, it is related to the condition of the dreamer. As for what is meant by it, it is evidence of Comfort and comfort and death of distress and distress, and for the poor he sings to the worlds and devotes himself to worship and for sake. The prisoner is a symbol of freedom and the fulfillment of desires and changing circumstances. The dove is an obedient and loving girl, and the pigeon represents the arrival of news and the harvest of wishes. Interpretation of a dream about a single woman’s dove: Seeing a dove symbolizes happy occasions in which the dreamer meets his friends and peers, and whoever sees the dove, it indicates the fulfillment of desires, the reaping of wishes, and the attainment of what is desired. The dove symbolizes a woman who remembers her kindness and prayers to God for her justice and success. The dove can symbolize a woman who has a hand in her engagement or marriage. Dove eggs symbolize menstruation. Owning a dove is a sign of gaining freedom and achieving planned goals and high aspirations. Feeding doves is a sign of advice from... Others and take advice. And if she sees a dove landing on her or standing on her shoulder, this is the help she will receive from her sister, mother, or friend. Interpretation of a dream about a black dove for a single woman: The color black is hated in most dreams, and the black dove indicates bad news, bad luck, and an upside-down case. A black dove could be a bad omen or a warning of behavior that she may regret later. If she sees a black dove landing on her, this is news that will come and bother her, and if the dove is black and ugly, this is a reflection of her obnoxious behavior and actions that she will make up for in an unsafe party, and she may fall into a plot arranged by her. Woman. Interpretation of a dream about a white dove for one woman. Seeing a dream about a white dove

The dove can symbolize a woman who has a hand in her engagement or marriage, and pigeon eggs symbolize menstruation, and owning a dove is a sign of gaining freedom, achieving planned goals and high aspirations, and feeding pigeons is an indication of advice from others and taking advice. If she sees a dove landing on her or standing on her shoulder, this is the help she receives from her sister, mother or friend. Interpretation of a dream about a black dove for a single woman The black color is hated in most dreams, and the black dove indicates bad news, bad luck and an inverted case. A black dove can be a bad omen or a warning of behavior that she may regret later. If she sees a black dove landing on her, this is news that will come and upset her, and if the dove is black and ugly, this is a reflection of her behavior and hateful actions that she compensates for in an unsafe party, and she may fall into a plot arranged by a woman. Interpretation of a dream about a white dove for a single woman Seeing a dove in a dream indicates that a black dove is a sign of bad luck and that a woman is not allowed to see it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a green dress for a woman and a man by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Today, all the details about seeing a green dress in a dream will be available. The interpretation of a green dress in a dream has special connotations for an unmarried girl, and this interpretation is different for a married woman. It is also completely different from men, young and old, and as we know that the green color in general is a sign of agriculture. Green spaces, which are good and available to the dreamer, are an indication of the presence of abundant money and an improvement in his financial condition, and the man who sees this dream becomes a blessing and luxury, as he lives as it is evidence of his religious integrity and closeness to God. Interpretation of a dream about a green dress by Ibn SirinThe other dress in the dream is The dress of the people of Paradise, so seeing it is mostly good for the dreamer. The green dress in the dream appears for happiness and the fulfillment of desires. Items of clothing. Green in a dream, in general, is a sign of piety and faith in God. The green dress in a dream is evidence of prosperity and marriage. The color green in general in a dream It is a sign of psychological stability. Whoever sees a green bed in his dream, this is evidence of the integrity of his religion. A man who sees a green dress in a dream indicates his marriage to a reputable girl who performs the duties of religion. A loose green dress in a dream is a sign of good morals and good faith with others. Interpretation of a dream about a green dress for a single woman. The girl is single. When she sees a green dress in a dream, this indicates her closeness to Almighty God and her faith in Him. If a girl sees in her dream a long green veil, this indicates that marriage is near and will be with a religious person who knows God. The green dress in a dream Evidence of longevity. If an unmarried woman sees herself buying a green dress, this indicates a good husband. Interpretation of a dream about a green dress for a pregnant womanWomen Pregnant When she sees a green dress in a dream, this indicates the presence of a male child. If a pregnant woman sees that she is in a place full of green things This indicates happiness, well-being, and good news. A green dress is evidence of an easy and affordable birth. Interpretation of a dream about a green dress for a married womanWomen When a married woman sees a green dress in a dream, this indicates that she will soon give birth to a child and that will be fair. Seeing the whole house in green indicates The people of the household enjoyed piety and faith. Add the dream you would like to interpret in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it

title: Interpretation of the Arab dream and seeing Arabs in a dream

preview.html: Seeing Arabs in a dream means facilitating matters, solving problems and other interpretations. We will explain it to the unmarried, married, pregnant, divorced woman and man, such as seeing an Arab girl or an Arab woman or seeing Arab clothes from Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi and others in the continuation of the topic. :Interpretation of Arabs in a dreamMeans Seeing Arabs in a dreamAnd about facilitating difficult matters, God Almighty said: (And this is a pure Arabic language). Seeing an Arab in a dream is a very beautiful vision that expresses a person's happiness in his life and his overcoming of material and moral problems and his success in his work and projects. Interpretation of the Arab face in a dreamThe passageSeeing Arabs in a dream about ease of living, less debt and less work burden. It also expresses education and diversity, finding a cure for illness, ending sadness, poverty, restoring a calm and comfortable mood, and again, it also indicates that the owner of the dream will get an increase in money and property. It also reflects receiving great news, a smiling face, and improving the mood. Seeing an Arab in a dream represents kindness and proves some wonderful developments in a person's life. These changes will be reflected in the person's family life and will make him very happy, and thanks to this everyone will be healthy and enjoy life. Seeing the Arabic letters of the alphabet in a dream indicates loss, sadness and severe sadness. Interpretation of an Arab girl in a dream Seeing an Arab girl in a dream expresses success and happiness and proves that the owner of the dream will rise to his work and succeed, and some wonderful changes will occur in the person's private life, especially since the person will make major changes in his professional life, which will increase his condition and increase his salary. Interpretation of seeing Arabs in a dream on YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dead person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person in a dream Despite the sadness we feel when our loved ones die, seeing the deceased in a dream is one of the most beautiful dreams that people see in their dreams, which we all hope will come true. In this context, we will provide you with an interpretation of seeing a deceased person in a dream, which usually indicates good news for the dreamer that he will achieve some of the things he desires and dreams of, or perhaps good news from the dead to the living that he will relieve his distress and escape from distress or distress or the occurrence of happy and joyful events in the coming period such as marriage, childbirth, finding a job, or perhaps traveling for Hajj or Umrah. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person in a dream There are many interpretations of seeing a dead person in a dream, although most of them indicate good news for the dreamer himself. Seeing the deceased in a dream and he says that he is alive, its interpretation depends on the owner of the vision himself, and it is not evidence that the deceased is alive with God or that he is in the state of witnesses, that is, a liar. However, its correct interpretation is that there is good news for the dreamer or that it may warn him of something. It usually indicates that there is something about the dreamer that has ended a while ago, but this matter will be revived again, and that there is good news for the dreamer. Or a lost job or a problem that has been disrupted. And if the dreamer ended up with a crisis or problem in the past, and the opinion of the deceased tells him that he is alive, this is evidence of the return of this crisis again, and a warning of the return of this problem to his life again. Interpretation of seeing the deceased in a beautiful way Seeing the deceased in the best image and in a good and beautiful image is one of the most beautiful visions, contrary to the belief of many people who explain that the deceased is in the best condition with his Lord, but the interpretation of the vision belongs to its owner and not to the deceased, although it indicates an improvement in the dreamer's condition and the resolution of the crises and problems he suffers from and their disintegration and facilitation of their disruption. After this vision and the circumstances and conditions of the dreamer. Improvement for the better. Seeing the deceased in a dream wearing green or white clothes is not an indication of the condition of the deceased, but rather an indication that something great will happen to the dreamer. The white dress means marriage if the dreamer is single or single. Interpretation of a dream about giving something to the deceased or taking something in a dream Some interpret the vision of the deceased giving something to the living as bringing good with him, and that if he takes something from him, it indicates that evil is coming to the living, and this is a wrong interpretation of the deceased's giving. Not everything is fine. So it can be bad, and the interpretation of the dream differs according to the narration of the symbols of the vision or according to what the deceased offers to the living, and perhaps his gift is bad and not good as some think. Giving dead meat to the living means death and not good. As for if the deceased takes something from the living in a dream, this is not bad as some interpret it, it may be a sign of the coming of good or relief from distress, or that it brings sadness and trouble, and it may also be reprehensible. Which carries evil in its aspects on the symbols of the dream. We hope that we have benefited you and provided you with all the information

title: Interpretation of a dream about the release of wind or smell from the anus in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a smell emanating from the buttocks indicates a good reputation and good morals, and other interpretations that we will explain to single, married, pregnant and divorced women, such as the anus, smelling the smell of feces or intercourse, a foul odor coming from the vagina, the sound of farts coming from the anus, or smelling the scent of the person of Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and others in... continuation. From the topic: Interpretation of a smell coming from the back passage in a dream. Seeing a bad smell coming from the anus in a dream indicates a bad reputation and bad morals. And whoever sees that a smell is coming out of him, this is praise, good remembrance, and good morals. Seeing a bad smell coming out in a dream expresses that one He goes through misfortunes and bad situations and indicates the corruption of one’s comfort, reassurance, and happiness due to some situations that one may face. Also, the emergence of a foul odor in a dream indicates falling into difficulties and hardships, as it indicates that the dreamer will remain helpless in the face of all his enemies. Interpretation of wind coming out of the back In a dream, seeing it pass in a dream expresses that the dreamer will receive great praise from others because he has a lot of money. Wind coming out of the anus in a dream indicates that the dreamer does not care about helping others, does not respect their ideas, and does not take their words seriously. Passing in a dream means that the dreamer He only thinks about his personal benefit, his own benefit, wealth, peace and comfort, and although he has many possibilities, he does not intervene to help his neighbors or relatives, as he suffers from a lack of feelings towards others and their problems. Seeing gases in the air in a dream means good things and luck. Happy future. Tilt in a dream represents the removal of evil and negative thoughts from a person’s heart, and indicates progress in work, success in silencing the devil inside, and shows that you deal with everything in a humble and modest way. Interpretation of wind in prayer in a dream Seeing wind coming out during prayer in a dream About the dreamer’s annoyance, boredom, and disturbed mood due to some of the situations he is going through, and although he will not commit sins, he will be responsible for some mistakes in his work and he will try to prove his innocence. The dream smells like it, and it expresses misery and curse and indicates that the person hears some words that bother him. It angers and angers him, and if the smell of the wind is very bad, it indicates weakness and hatred. Passing wind during prayer in a dream expresses fear, falling into trouble, and fatigue, as well as indicating falling into a misfortune and regretting it afterwards due to irrational behavior on the part of the dreamer. Spreading the smell of wind in The dream represents taking some wrong steps that cause a lot of discomfort to the person and indicates the corruption of calm due to some situations that one is going through. Seeing yourself kneeling in prayer indicates a person swaying behind your back and you will still be forced to face this person, and this vision also indicates that you must You should be careful in your words and actions so as not to say inappropriate words that will make you lose respect. In front of others. Interpretation of wind in a dream is interpreted

title: Interpretation of buttons in a dream and a button in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of buttons on a shirt, dress, pants, skirt, sewing, sleeves, cutting, shearing, fall, loss, black, white, large, small, open and more, by Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq, and others.Buttons in a dream are among the dreams that we constantly see in Dreams cause us great anxiety, and seeing them constantly in dreams is due to the constant association with buttons in public life, which are present in all of our clothes that we wear on a daily basis, and we see buttons in many different shapes because of the colors and shapes available in public life, which differ from one person to another. Interpretation of buttons in a dreamInterpretation Al-Nabulsi dream of seeing a button: It is in a dream of an infallible necklace, and perhaps it indicates money or livelihood, especially if it is made of silver or gold. The button and the buttonhole indicate a man and a woman, so whoever sees that he has put a button in the buttonhole, then he will marry if he is not married, otherwise it is a separation. If a girl dreams that she is sewing buttons, this symbolizes that she will find a rich man to share her life with in marriage. As for a young man who dreams, this means honor and wealth. To dream of a shirt button means that you will fight to protect your pride and success. Button If a girl dreams that she is sewing bright and sparkling buttons on a dress, It indicates warm affection from a wealthy and handsome marriage partner. As for young people, it symbolizes enlistment in military ceremonies and a brilliant career. If the buttons are faded or fabric buttons, it means disappointment, a set of losses and poor health. It means losing a button and the resulting anxiety that equates to losing The dress predicts losses in business. If these buttons are of precious stones and the middle stone is larger than the other stones, this foretells that you will gain wealth and live a comfortable life among good friends. In our article today we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing buttons in a dream, as explained by the great interpreter Imam Al-Sadiq in his various interpretations. Interpretation of buttons in a dream: Seeing a button in a dream is evidence of tradition and infallibility in life. As the button appears in the dream, it is evidence of money and livelihood in the near future. A button and a buttonhole in a dream is evidence of a man and a woman in public life. Fastening the button in A buttonhole in a dream is evidence of a single person’s marriage in the near future. A girl who wears buttons in a dream is evidence that she will marry a rich man in the near future. Buttoning a shirt in a dream is evidence of the struggle to protect yourself in life. A button in a dream is a sign of... Good and upcoming happiness for the dreamer. You sew buttons in a dream, a sign of wealth in life. Buttoning a shirt in a dream is evidence of suffering in life to achieve a lot. Sewing a shiny button for a girl in a dream is evidence of love and romance that will soon enter. Seeing buttons in a dream is evidence To get married in the near future. A young man who sees buttons in a dream is evidence that he will be involved in some problems at work. Faded buttons in a dream are evidence of...
